description: Will Oremus, tech blogger at Slate joins us to play this week’s Silicon Tally. Plus, the online food delivery service - GrubHub -- begins trading on the New York Stock Exchange. The company could raise around $176 million. In fact, the pre-IPO price has moved higher over the past few months, even before it started trading on Wall Street. Why is it so attractive to investors?
title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, April 4, 2014
teaser: Will Oremus, tech blogger at Slate joins us to play this week’s Silicon Tally. Plus, the online food delivery service - GrubHub -- begins trading on the New York Stock Exchange. The company could raise around $176 million. In fact, the pre-IPO price has moved higher over the past few months, even before it started trading on Wall Street. Why is it so attractive to investors?
